title: The Secretive World Of MEV, Where Bots Front-Run Crypto Investors For Big Profits
author: Jeff Kauflin
description: True believers say crypto is more transparent than traditional finance. Yet that openness—combined with clunky infrastructure and an absence of regulation–lets crypto trading firms with lightning-fast bots prey on unsuspecting retail traders.

title: Fintech 50 2022: The Newcomers
author: Jeff Kauflin
description: For our seventh annual Fintech 50, 25 of our picks have never appeared on the list. Crypto companies and startups trying to make banking cheaper and more accessible for small businesses made a particularly strong showing.

title: After Raising $40 Million, African Bitcoin Exchange Yellow Card Seeks ‘Unicorn Status By End Of 2023’
author: Oluwaseun Adeyanju
description: Pan-African crypto exchange Yellow Card has announced the raise of $40 million in Series B financing to fund its growth plans.

title: The Future Of Crypto And Blockchain: Fintech 50 2022
author: Nina Bambysheva
description: A record nine cryptocurrency-focused companies made it onto the Forbes Fintech 50 list this year. Collectively, the trailblazers have raised $6.5 billion in venture capital funding.

title: Asian American And Pacific Islander Crypto Leaders To Watch
author: Cleve Mesidor
description: Asian American, Native Hawaiian, and Pacific Islander leaders in Web3 and DeFi are blazing new trails and are making their North Star a measure of impact as they work toward building a more open, inclusive financial system to fuel the future of money and commerce.
